com.T05.krowdtrialz.util

Class Statistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.T05.krowdtrialz.util.Statistics

  • public class Statistics
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for implementing common statistics calculations such as standard deviation and quartiles. This class acts as a thin wrapper over the Apache Commons Math library.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Statistics()

      • mean

        public static double mean(double[] data)
        Calculates the mean of the data. Returns NaN if data is empty array.
        Parameters:
        data - The data to calculate the mean for.
        Returns:
        The mean.

      • standardDeviation

        public static double standardDeviation(double[] data)
        Calculates the standard deviation of the data. Returns NaN if data is empty array.
        Parameters:
        data - The data to calculate the standard deviation for.
        Returns:
        The standard deviation.

        Returns:

      • quartile

        public static double quartile(double[] data,
                              int q)
        Calculates the value of the qth quartile. For example, quartile(2) returns the 2nd quartile (median).
        Parameters:
        q - The number of the quartile.
        Returns:
        The value of the qth quartile.
